<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create Google Pay token"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/payment-methods/google-pay"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



    Create a new Google Pay payment method for the Account.

    ### Permissions
    * `payment-method:capture`
    * `payment-method:write`

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
